Question.Subject: What are some good comebacks?
Question.Content:
There is this REALLY annoying kid at school! I want some good combacks, so here is some info:
He eats at a resturant almost every night. He weighs over 175 pounds. He thinks he is mighty and strong, but he is weak!
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Yeah, let's make fun of the fat kid whose supper eating habits have nothing to do with anything.
Here's a good comeback: You're an idiot.
And by 'you're', I mean YOU.

Answer.Content:
Yeah, let's make fun of the fat kid whose supper eating habits have nothing to do with anything.
Here's a good comeback: You're an idiot.
And by 'you're', I mean YOU.

It depends on what this fatass kid says. Some comebacks I just thought of: :P
I know you are but what am I? How much you weigh fatty? A ton? Did your mom birth you that stupid? Or are you just mentally retarded. I saw u last night masterbait and have sex with your mom so stfu kid. Hey, has anyone ever told you that you could be a master asshole?
Anyway, those are some comebacks if he annoys you or anything. Hope that kid fucks off.
